title: [Self-Directed] Purpose and Value of Higher Education: Instructional Design and Technology Integration Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with university education systems and foundational instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Modular learning content via mobile devices to support flexible learning for time-constrained adult learners.

learning_goals: Explain at least three core values and social roles of higher education
Propose case-specific strategies for instructional design and technology to address pressures of competition, growth, and accountability
Design practical instructional strategies for integrating research and education and implement them as microlearning content
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
